products.productName: Lipton Unsweetened Decaffeinated Instant Tea Mix, 30 Quarts
products.description: 0 Calories. 100% Delicious. Caffeine Free. Enjoy Unsweetened Decaffeinated Lipton Iced Tea Mix with no calories and no added sweeteners. Our Iced Tea Mixes are brewed from real leaves so the taste is pure and satisfying. And, who else but Lipton could serve up so many ways to enjoy the convenience of instant tea? Nutrition experts agree that calorie-free tea is an excellent beverage for hydration. Enjoy the great refreshing taste of Lipton Unsweetened Decaffeinated Iced Tea Mix. ||Serving Size: 2.000 ||Servings per Container: 120.000 ||Containers per Package: 1.000 ||Total Volume: 3.000 ||Form: powdered ||Made in the USA or Imported
